title: Farthing biscuits
description: These large savoury biscuits are a traditional Scottish recipe. They are made with lard and very simple to make. Serve with a generous spread of butter.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 9cm/3½in round cutter.
ingredients: 225g/8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
85g/3oz lightly salted butter, plus extra to serve
